enhanced_description: Allsec Technologies is a global outsourcing solutions provider with over 20 years of experience, serving over 600 companies in 42+ countries, primarily targeting large enterprises. As a publicly listed subsidiary of Quess Corp, backed by Fairfax holdings, Allsec provides credible and proficient outsourced HR and payroll services, including an all-in-one HR Management System (Smart HR) and timely payroll processing (Smart Pay). The company focuses on crafting exceptional employee journeys and integrating the human element back into HR systems, leveraging a combination of human expertise, cutting-edge technology, and advanced analytics for its services.
